mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM CRAFWORK_CHANGE_MAIN m LEFT JOIN hcm.cas_org o ON o.id = m.org_id AND o.company_id = m.company_id AND o.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN voucher_main_oa v ON v.voucher_no = m.voucher_no AND v.company_id = m.company_id AND v.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN crm.dict_crm d ON d.`value` = v.is_finished

order by m.id desc
